title: On Ubuntu, when putting middle button, Firefox swap me immediatly into new tab. Or I want just opening new tab but not going into it.
content:
Dear Sir,

It happen to me recently, when I put on middle button, Firefox sent me directly on new tab just opened. Or I want stay on the main search page(primary tab). I try to do Firefox Reset, Restart with Add-ons disable, Clear startup cache... Nothing. Especially, It happen to me when Firefox account is connected. All my computer do the same. I set up a new Ubuntu and install a new Firefox, but no account connected. I work correctly.

Best Regards. Sri
creator: ljacson168

title: Problem with VMWARE Workstation pro when Firefox is running
content:
I have Intel CPU laptop with 16GB ram, Windows 10 (1903) I have Firefox running with roughly 40 tabs open. Task manager says it takes around 1 GB Ram It also says that 8 GB system memory is still free. When I start virtual machine in VMWARE (ver. 16) I get a problem. (VM is configured to use 6 GR of RAM.) VMWare reports an error when opening the vdmk file for some reason. If I click on retry usually system crashes. (no message, just black screen, never responding). In some cases it responds after several minutes but crashes later. Sometimes Firefox crashes, it simply disappears from screen.

I tried to investigate what could be the reason and I tried different combinations but this happens only when Firefox is open. If I have any other memory intensive programs open and I open VM it never crashes.

Anybody having the same issue?

Thanks for help

Jaro
creator: jgriscik

title: Sudden zoom in during meeting on google meet
content: Whenever I'm in a meeting and if someone is sharing their screen then it suddenly gets zoom in and it's difficult. From past few days it is happening during the whole meeting and it's hard to concentrate.
creator: saijal.goyal00

title: Can't subscribe to web notifications
content:
Hi, I can not subscribe to and receive web notifications from Twitter, Trakt.tv, Gmail, Outlook, etc. Twitter says: "Unsupported browser. It looks like your browser doesn’t support push notifications." and Trakt.tv just gives no reponse after the "connect" button is clicked. I can enable the settings in Gmail and Outlook but never get one notification.

I've tried tests like https://gauntface.github.io/simple-push-demo/, the result is: Ooops a Problem Occurred AbortError: Error retrieving push subscription.

Those web notifications work well in Chrome and Edge. System settings are ok as Firefox shows notifications from Snooze Tabs.

I'm using Firefox 83.0b6, tried Firefox 82.0.2 and Firefox Developer Edition on a MacBook Air 2017 with macOS Catalina 10.15.7.

Any help is appreciated. Thanks in advance!
creator: croonr

title: Links from other programs opening a new window (without my credentials saved)
content:
On my Windows PC, I have Firefox set as my Default browser. Whenever I click on a link from another program (email client for instance), it opens a new Firefox window. The issue is that I have to login to the website again, even if its already open in another window.

For instance: Firefox main window - I login to website ABC, sometimes using Multi-factor authentication.

I then click on a link from my email client that also points to website ABC. A new Firefox window opens up and I have to re-authenticate into website ABC.

Its very frustrating having to re-authenticate everytime I click on a link. I am logged into Firefox and have Sync turned on. Am I missing something?
creator: theth200

title: Disable the blue light when a pinned Gmail get a new email or the tab updates?
content:

Please help me. :)

title: Não é possível acessar a câmera em nenhum site
content:
Não é possível acessar a câmera ou o microfone usando o Firefox em diversos sites diferentes e para finalidades diferentes. Os sites não identificam esses dispositivos e sequer solicitam permissão para acessá-los. Qual pode ser o problema?

Testei habilitar primeiro as permissões para câmera e microfone, mas acabei com as mesmas mensagens de que o site não pôde acessar a câmera ou não foi encontrada uma câmera no meu dispositivo.

Mesmos sites testados em outro navegador, não houve o erro. Câmera e microfone funcionam em outros aplicativos do computador.

Uso o Firefox 82.0 (64-bits) instalado via Flatpak no Fedora 33 Workstation Edition rodando em Wayland. Mesmo problema com a versão em RPM.

Agradeço desde já pela ajuda!
creator: elivansilvamaia

title: Open bookmarks in same tab...
content: Is there any setting that I can change to force Firefox to open bookmarks in the same tab that I have open when clicking on a bookmark? I hope this makes sense. In other words, right now I'm on the Mozilla support page writing this. If I click on a bookmark in the bookmarks bar, it always opens a new tab. I want to force it to stay on this tab and go to the bookmark. Thanks.
creator: PlainDave

title: Adware, estou seguro?
content: Boa noite, estava usando a internet para fazer um trabalho da faculdade e entro em um site para ler um artigo e sou surpreendido com uma página de Visitande Número “X” do site (algo desse tipo), e que ganhei 2000 reais, a página era muito bem montada, tinha até uma animação, fechei ela na hora. Logo, baixei o Adwcleaner e o Malwarebytes e eles acharam um adware relacionado a Amazon, da extensão do Amazon assistant (a única que usava). Também baixei o Adblock para me previnir futuramente. Enfim, meus dados estão seguros mesmo tendo entrado naquela página e não ter clicado em nada? Obrigado!
creator: arwscs

title: Sync won't transfer my passwords to my new computer
content: I save my passwords with sync. I got a new computer, signed into firefox on it, and synced, but none of my passwords are on my new computer. Both are up to date. I tried to install the firefox app on my iPhone just in case, and when i synced i got the one login synced from my new computer, but not my old. How do i get those passwords to appear on my new computer?
creator: cedimo04

title: Find Bookmark Location
content:
I have hundreds of FireFox bookmarks organized in bookmarks folders and subfolders which makes sense most of the time.

However, with seldom used bookmarks, often I cannot remember where the bookmark itself is located, and, I need like to find the bookmark and note the folder where it resides then perhaps move the bookmark to a folder that makes more sense the next time it's needed.

While I can "search" bookmarks and use the bookmark, there is no apparent way to determine where the bookmark itself is located, so, I am forced to use "search" every time I need to use it. "Abandoning" a lost bookmark location and creating a duplicate does not seem right.

There MUST be a way to find where a bookmark is located. What am I missing?

Thanks in advance, Beverly Howard
creator: bevhoward

title: Firefox Cookies Being Deleted
content: Since the most recent Firefox for Windows update, all of my Firefox browsers on my PCs have suddenly stopped saving my already logged in cookies for my major use websites, such as Facebook, Outlook, Amazon, and Netflix. For the past few years, these websites all stay logged in, even when I have Firefox set to delete cookies when the browser is closed, in part because I have these websites all carefully noted in the cookies and site data exceptions. As I said, I've never had problems for the past few years. But since the most recent update a few weeks ago, all of my websites log me out after 24 hrs. I even changed the main cookies settings to not delete any cookies when the browser is closed, but that makes no difference. Something has changed in the most recent Firefox that has disabled the managed exceptions to cookie deletion. I'd love some help on how to fix this, as changing settings does not seem to do it.
creator: decorus_veritas
